com.emitrom.pilot.core.shared.client.data

Class BeanFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.emitrom.pilot.core.shared.client.data.BeanFactory

  • public abstract class BeanFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    BeanModelFactores are responsible for creating new Bean instances from Java POJOs. BeanModels are GXT models and can be used with the GXT data API. BeanModelFactories are obtained from @link BeanLookup.
    See Also:
    BeanLookup
